sentences.en: Fibre is found in cereal foods, beans, fruit and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 谷类食品、豆类、水果和蔬菜中含有纤维素。

sentences.en: I have hot cereal every day for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我每天早餐吃热麦片粥.

sentences.en: I'll plump for bacon and eggs rather than breakfast cereal.
sentences.cn: 我宁愿吃咸肉和鸡蛋,而不愿吃谷类制作的早餐食品.

sentences.en: I've just bought a box of cereal.
Mycelium on cereal grain is termed mold growth.
sentences.cn: 在谷物上生长的菌丝体叫做发霉.

sentences.en: Now, place the record above each cereal scattered on the table.
sentences.cn: 现在, 将唱片置于散落在桌面的麦片上方.

sentences.en: Put some milk on the stove for your cereal - in a saucepan, Clarrie!
sentences.cn: 倒点牛奶放在炉子上煮,给你浇麦片 —— 用平底锅, 克拉利!

sentences.en: Rice is the most important cereal in many tropical and sub - tropical areas.
sentences.cn: 在很多热带和亚热带地区,水稻是最主要的谷类作物.

sentences.en: The addition of fruit makes the cereal taste good.
sentences.cn: 加了水果使谷类食品变得可口.

sentences.en: The breakfast cereal is enriched with vitamins.
sentences.cn: 维生素增加了早餐谷类食物的营养价值.

sentences.en: The cereal is packaged in plain boxes.
sentences.cn: 谷类食品用简单的盒子包装.

sentences.en: They ate a large bowlful of cereal.
sentences.cn: 他们吃了一大碗麦片粥。

sentences.en: This is because the record and the cereal have opposite charges.
sentences.cn: 这是因为唱片和麦片会有相反的电荷.

sentences.en: Wine growers say they've been held hostage to the interests of the cereal and soybean farmers.
sentences.cn: 葡萄种植兼酿酒者说他们一直都为谷物和大豆种植者的利益所绑架。

words.tran_cn: [作物]谷类，谷物；谷类食品；谷类植物

trans.tran_en: a plant grown to produce grain, for example wheat, rice etc
